pepper.framework.infra.resource.threaded module¶

class pepper.framework.infra.resource.threaded.ThreadedReadLock(rw_lock, resource_name)[source]¶

Bases: pepper.framework.infra.resource.api.ReadLock

acquire(blocking=True, timeout=None)[source]¶

Acquire the lock. By defaults blocks and waits forever.

Parameters

  • blocking (bool) – Block until lock is obtained or return immediately

  • timeout (float or None) – Wait at most the specified timeout in seconds to acquire the lock if the specified timeout is positive, otherwise wait indefinitely.

Returns

Signal if the lock was acquired

Return type

bool

Raises

LockTimeoutError – if the lock wasn’t acquired within timeout seconds.

interrupt_writers(interrupt=True)[source]¶

Set the interrupted flag on the lock to signal the current owner that the lock should be released.

property interrupted¶

Signals that the lock should be released by the current owner.

Returns

Whether the lock should be released by the current owner.

Return type

bool

property locked¶

Check if the lock is held by someone.

Returns

Signal if the lock is held by someone.

Return type

bool

release()[source]¶

Release the lock.

get_lock(name, blocking=True, timeout=None)[source]¶

Obtain a Lock for the given resource.

Parameters

  • blocking (bool) – Block until the resource is available or return immediately

  • timeout (float or None) – Wait at most the specified timeout in seconds until the resource is available if the specified timeout is positive, otherwise wait indefinitely.

Returns

The lock.

Return type

Lock

get_read_lock(name, blocking=True, timeout=None)[source]¶

Obtain a ReadLock for the given resource.

Parameters

  • blocking (bool) – Block until the resource is available or return immediately

  • timeout (float or None) – Wait at most the specified timeout in seconds until the resource is available if the specified timeout is positive, otherwise wait indefinitely.

Returns

The lock.

Return type

Lock

get_write_lock(name, blocking=True, timeout=None, writer_interrupts=False)[source]¶

Obtain a WriteLock for the given resource.

Parameters

  • blocking (bool) – Block until the resource is available or return immediately

  • timeout (float or None) – Wait at most the specified timeout in seconds until the resource is available if the specified timeout is positive, otherwise wait indefinitely.

Returns

The lock.

Return type

Lock

provide_resource(name)[source]¶

Register the resource with the given name.

Parameters

name (str) – The name of the resource.

Raises

ValueError – if there is already a resource registered with the given name.

property resources¶

Retrieve all currently registered resource names.

Returns

A collection of the registered resource names.

Return type

Iterable[(str)]

retract_resource(name, force=True, timeout=None)[source]¶

Unregister the resource with the given name.

Parameters

  • name (str) – The name of the resource.

  • force (bool) – Immediately retract the resource or block until all users released the released the resource.

  • timeout (float or None) – Wait at most the specified timeout in seconds until the resource is released if the specified timeout is positive, otherwise wait indefinitely.
